name: Night on Mt. Doom
description:
Instructions:

Purify Maajin-Yama by throwing salt into the bonfire!

Repel the demon's advance with your flute and bells!

How to Play:

WASD to Move

E to Interact, Pickup, and Drop

Press or Hold Left Click to Play the Flute
